title: Glencoco Raises $3M to Create B2B Lead Exchange Marketplace
originSummary: Glencoco, a B2B sales marketplace, secures $3 million in funding to create a platform for companies to exchange leads for rewards.
The platform connects companies with business development consultants who generate qualified opportunities.
Glencoco offers tools and software for companies to list campaigns, along with sales productivity tools and infrastructure for same-day payments, call analytics, and scheduling.

title: Glencoco secures $3M funding to connect businesses with sales experts
originSummary: Glencoco Inc., a B2B marketplace startup, raised $3 million in funding for platform and infrastructure development.
The company connects businesses with business development consultants to generate qualified opportunities.

Glencoco provides tools and software for companies to list campaigns on its marketplace and allows certified consultants to source sales-qualified meetings on a flexible, gig, and remote basis. The platform includes features such as phone dialers and sales training modules.

title: Nylas and Twilio Partner to Boost Customer Engagement and Developer Experiences
originSummary: Nylas and Twilio have partnered to improve customer engagement and developer experiences.
The partnership allows organizations to access additional channels, tools, and data to speed up development and automate workflows.
The aim of the partnership is to provide seamless integration of essential business communication channels, enhance user productivity, and boost customer satisfaction.

title: Starbucks Workers Protest for Better Staffing and Schedules
originSummary: Workers at hundreds of Starbucks stores in the US walked out during the Red Cup Day event, demanding better staffing and schedules.
The Workers United union, representing over 9,000 Starbucks employees, claims that employees are overworked and improperly staffed during this event.

Although Starbucks stated that only a few dozen stores were on strike and that most stores remained open, the protest highlights the ongoing concerns regarding staffing and worker dissatisfaction at the coffee chain.

title: Hybrid meeting solutions dominate Crestron's Zoom Certified products at Zoomtopia 2023
originSummary: Crestron unveiled new hybrid meeting solutions at Zoomtopia 2023, including the Crestron Videobar 70 collaboration bar and the AutoTracker and AutoFramer tracking cameras, all Zoom Certified.
The Videobar 70 features top-notch cameras, beamforming microphones, and user-friendly controls.
The AutoTracker and AutoFramer cameras provide intelligent tracking capabilities for presenters and groups, enhancing the meeting experience.
Crestron also introduced the Flex Phone for individual desktop use and the Scheduling Panel with Zoom Rooms software.
The partnership between Crestron and Zoom is expanding, demonstrating their dedication to delivering high-quality collaboration solutions.

title: Allegra Revolutionizes Chronic Disease Management for World AIDS Day
originSummary: Allegra Healthcare Management is partnering with healthcare providers to redefine chronic disease management, specifically focusing on HIV and AIDS, in celebration of World AIDS Day on December 1st.

Their goal is to offer personalized care to individuals with chronic illnesses by using innovative health-tech solutions that simplify the healthcare process and guarantee patients receive the necessary assistance.

The initiative encompasses features like online appointment scheduling, telehealth software, pathology tests, and secure electronic scripts, with the ultimate aim of making healthcare more accessible, efficient, and patient-centered. They're also welcoming interested parties and healthcare providers to get involved in this mission.

title: Taskforce Australia's RentSafe Platform Wins Innovation Award at Smart50 Awards 2023
originSummary: Taskforce Australia, a real estate and construction company, has seen substantial growth since its establishment in 2014.

The company started by offering warranty and installation services for major brands but found success in the real estate industry with its RentSafe platform for rental property safety compliance checks.

Taskforce Australia has completed over 140,000 jobs on RentSafe and is now expanding into the rental repair space with its RentRepair service. The company was also recognized as a Smart50 Awards 2023 Innovation Award finalist.

title: Digital Lending Platform Market Worth $46.4B by 2032 - Growing Demand for Online Banking Drives Growth
originSummary: The global digital lending platform market is projected to reach USD 46.4 billion by 2032.
The increasing demand for online banking is fueling the growth of the market.
Adoption of cutting-edge technologies like blockchain, AI, and machine learning is expected to enhance the capabilities of digital lending platforms.
North America dominates the market, accounting for 41% of the market revenue share in 2022.
Open banking technology is on the rise, enabling lenders to aggregate borrower data and make faster decisions.
The market is driven by factors such as the widespread use of smartphones, the popularity of online banking, and the advantages of digital automation.
However, regulatory challenges and cybersecurity risks pose obstacles to market growth.
Key players in the market include Nucleus Software, FIS, Tavant, and Intellect Design Arena.
